parameter.name: title
parameter.label: Title
parameter.description: Please specify title you want to display on the frontend. You can leave it blank if necessary.

parameter.name: number_of_colors
parameter.label: Number of Colors
parameter.description: Please indicate number of recent colors you want to display. Leave blank to use predefined "Colors Per Page" value.

parameter.name: category_id
parameter.label: Color Category
parameter.description: Leave blank to display colors from all categories.

parameter.name: custom_template
parameter.label: Custom Template
parameter.description:
Leave blank to use default template Designnbuy_Color::widget/recent.phtml.
Designnbuy_Color::widget/recent_masonry.phtml template is also available out of the box.
